title: CS Practical Competency Strengthening: Foundational Programming Skills Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can implement simple calculation programs using basic Python syntax (variables, conditionals, loops)
Learners can identify and correct over 80% of issues in error-prone code using debugging tools
Learners can explain sequential/branching thinking processes for programming problem-solving in three or more stages

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
